extendedInfo.description: The Best LIE DETECTOR for FUN!Fake lie detector to have some fun with your family and friends. This is NOT REAL application of lie detector. Convince them that your device have capabilities to analyze whether the answer is true or false.Here are the step by step on how to do it :1. Ask a QUESTION to your family/friends.2. Put your finger on "START ANALYSIS" button to pretend that you are recording their answer.3. Before release your finger, TILT the gadget to CONTROL the result.- Focus on the MIDDLE light, it will show GREEN(TRUE), RED(FALSE) or YELLOW(RANDOM).- TILT to the LEFT to get GREEN light. - Stay in the CENTER to get YELLOW light.- TILT to the RIGHT to get RED light. - If you want STRONG TRUE, TILT again to the LEFT until you see the 2nd light from the LEFT is GREEN.- If you want WEAK TRUE, TILT again to the LEFT until you see the 2nd light from the LEFT is YELLOW.- If you want STRONG FALSE, TILT again to the RIGHT until you see the 2nd light from the RIGHT is RED.- If you want WEAK FALSE, TILT again to the RIGHT until you see the 2nd light from the RIGHT is YELLOW.4. Release you finger from the button and wait for the result. Any movement on the device after that will not make any different on the result.Now enjoy the apps and have some fun with your family and friends!
